com.kamontat.model.management

Class Cache

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kamontat.model.management.Cache

  • public class Cache
extends java.lang.Object
    This class for save the object into file and can restore every time
    Easy to use and manage
    1) call method loadCache(file name) to getLog name of the file cache
    2) and than there have 4 method that you can use it
    1. saveToFile(object) - must be sure that object implements Serializable.
    2. loadFromFile(class) - you can specify return class by pass in parameter.
    3. isExist() - to check that cache file is exist or not.
    4. delete() - delete cache file.
    Since:
    1/28/2017 AD - 1:04 AM

    • Method Detail

      • loadCache

        public static Cache loadCache(java.lang.String fileName)
        only this method than can return Cache this method will create new cache and name it by parameter
        Parameters:
        fileName - cache file name
        Returns:
        Cache that you can use later

      • saveToFile

        public <E extends java.io.Serializable> void saveToFile(E obj)
        save the object in default folder which is caches with file name that you naming before
        Type Parameters:
        E - object must implements Serializable
        Parameters:
        obj - object that want to save

      • loadFromFile

        public <E> E loadFromFile(java.lang.Class<E> eClass)
        load object from file that you naming before.
        the return object class will same as the parameter so pass clearing parameter
        or you don't know the object class you can pass Object.class
        Example: 
        
 // return String
 String name = Cache.loadCache("name").loadFromFile(String.class);
 
        
 // return Object
 Object object = Cache.loadCache("obj").loadFromFile(Object.class);
        Type Parameters:
        E - every class in java.
        Parameters:
        eClass - you can getLog class by using .class
        Returns:
        saving object in cache file by from of eClass.
        or null if
        • Class not found.
        • Cannot cast result object to eClass.
        • Have problem when load file.

      • delete

        public boolean delete()
        delete cache file.
        Returns:
        true if delete completely, otherwise return false.

      • isExist

        public boolean isExist()
        check is cache file exist or not.
        Returns:
        true if exist, otherwise return false.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
